com.ca.mas.core.auth

Class PollingRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ca.mas.core.auth.AuthRenderer
      • com.ca.mas.core.auth.PollingRenderer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BluetoothLeCentralRenderer, NFCRenderer, QRCodeRenderer

    public abstract class PollingRenderer
extends AuthRenderer
    Poll MAG periodically for the Authorization Code
